data.description: Improve SparkSLM for code assistance: 1) Fix slow fallback path (cache _most_frequent_words), 2) Add code-aware tokenizer preserving punctuation, 3) Explore AST-based training for richer code structure
data.title: SparkSLM Code Intelligence Improvements
